author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

Showcasing gruesome dismemberment physics and open world roaming, the C-Engine at the heart of Dying Light The Beast returns - for now on the quartet of current-gen systems. PS5 Pro really is in the spotlight here, given promise of Pro specific upgrades from developer Techland, though for now the advantage is primarily in image quality, as Tom explains.

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 - Introduction
01:45 - PS5/Pro/Series X Comparisons
04:44 - 120Hz Performance/30FPS Quality Mode Frame-Rate tests
08:13 - The Series S Question
09:34 - Verdict
title: Dying Light: The Beast - DF Review - PS5/PS5 Pro/Xbox Series X|S - Solid Performance!
